ing.item: Ripe banana; peeled and sliced lengthwise

directions.step:
This is from: BRENNAN'S New Orleans cookbook
Melt brown sugar and butter in flat chafing dish. Add bananas and saute until tender Sprinkle with cinnamon Pour in banana liqueur and rum over all and flame Baste with warm liquid until flame burns out Serve immediately over ice cream 1 serving
My son went to Brennan's in New Orleans a few years ago and had this and he loved it. He brought me back the cookbook.
